name: lemon
description: Yellow fruit. It smells of citrus. Tart but when the game devs give you one of these, make lemonade

name: moped
description: Part motorcycle, part bicycle, pure Italy. Reduces travel time by 75%!

name: espresso
description: THIS STUFF WILL GIVE YOU ALL THE ENERGY!! AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!

name: coin
description: Shiny money. Some people enjoy throwing them into fountains. Maybe someone in the game??

name: horse
description: Four legged animal that allows you to cut travel time in half. Likes carrots. Giddy up!

name: coin
description: Shiny money. Some people enjoy throwing them into fountains. Maybe someone in the game??

name: cannoli
description: Italian dessert. Kind of like a burrito but filled with cream and other sweets.

name: cookbook
description: Instructions to cook things. Contains many Italian Dishes

name: wine glass
description:
A glass used to hold wine.
 Hold it by the stem and swirl the wine to seem more
 sophisticated.

name: olive oil
description: Oil made from olives. Ingredient used in many dishes. Some call it the elixir of life.

name: marble sculpture
description: Look at it. Beautiful sculpture of whatever your mind desires. Use your imagination!

name: yellow rain jacket
description: Keeps you safe from the rain.
